name: Imperial Club
overview:
“At Imperial Club, we understand that each resident’s needs are different.”

Imperial Club is a national non-profit organization that is committed to providing affordable, quality retirement housing to America’s senior community. Imperial Club is professionally managed by Triad Senior Living, a company with a successful history of providing quality care to seniors since 1990.

Our management philosophy is to see each resident as an individual who has been created in God’s image and has value and deserves respect, and we work hard to instill this as part of our overall operating point of view.

At Imperial Club, we pride ourselves in being one of South Florida’s finest, rental retirement communities. We offer both independent, independent plus and assisted living services, therefore we are able to accommodate our residents as they age in place throughout their retirement.

Resident Services •3 chef-prepared meals per day: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner •Kosher Meals Available •Weekly Housekeeping Services •Scheduled Transportation: Daily transportation to local shopping, medical centres, restaurants, and more •Apartment Maintenance: Never again have to worry about the upkeep of a condo or home •Fabulous Activities Programs: Our community is often referred to as a cruise ship on land! •Exercise Centre: Access to state of the art equipment and exercise classes

Community Amenities

•Restaurant-Style Dining •Health & Wellness Centre: On-site physician appointments, on-site rehabilitation, exercise classes, and state-of-the art equipment •Extensive Activities Program, 365 days of the year •Laundry Services •Computer Room & Library •Piano Lounge •Heated Pool •Beauty & Barber Shop •Daily Afternoon Social Hour •Newspaper delivery •Room Service available •Guest Accommodations, for when friends & family visit •Live On-Site Entertainment •Weekly Shabbat Services
